item.title: Depoy add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Those who tell the stories rule society." -- Plato

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something." -- Plato

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Freethinkers are those who are willing to use their minds without prejudice and without fearing to understand things that clash with their own customs, privileges, or beliefs. This state of mind is not common, but it is essential for right thinking..." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "God has no religion." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Myth is what we call other people's religion." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Seno Gumira Ajidarma
item.description: "Aku tidak pernah keberatan menunggu siapa pun berapa lama pun selama aku mencintainya" (dalam cerpen Linguae, Linguae, Gramedia, 2007)" -- Seno Gumira Ajidarma

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Titon Rahmawan
item.description: "Mengapa aku begitu mencintai dunia ini, padahal ia telah mengkhianati diriku dan merampas kemurnianku?" -- Titon Rahmawan

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Semakin aku banyak membaca, semakin aku banyak berpikir; semakin aku banyak belajar, semakin aku sadar bahwa aku tak mengetahui apa pun" -- Voltaire

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Wiji Thukul
item.description: "Apa gunanya banyak baca buku Kalau mulut kau bungkam melulu" -- Wiji Thukul

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Depoy add a quote by Pamela Redmond Satran
item.description: "A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... enough money within her control to move out and rent a place of her own even if she never wants to or needs to... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... something perfect to wear if the employer or date of her dreams wants to see her in an hour... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE ... a youth she's content to leave behind.... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a past juicy enough that she's looking forward to retelling it in her old age.... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE ..... a set of screwdrivers, a cordless drill, and a black lace bra... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... one friend who always makes her laugh... and one who lets her cry... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a good piece of furniture not previously owned by anyone else in her family... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... eight matching plates, wine glasses with stems, and a recipe for a meal that will make her guests feel honored... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a feeling of control over her destiny... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... how to fall in love without losing herself.. EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... HOW TO QUIT A JOB, BREAK UP WITH A LOVER, AND CONFRONT A FRIEND WITHOUT RUINING THE FRIENDSHIP... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... when to try harder... and WHEN TO WALK AWAY... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... that she can't change the length of her calves, the width of her hips, or the nature of her parents.. EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... that her childhood may not have been perfect...but it's over... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... what she would and wouldn't do for love or more... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... how to live alone... even if she doesn't like it... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... whom she can trust, whom she can't, and why she shouldn't take it personally... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... where to go... be it to her best friend's kitchen table... or a charming inn in the woods... when her soul needs soothing... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... what she can and can't accomplish in a day... a month...and a year..." -- Pamela Redmond Satran
